titleStmt.title: A treatise of civil policy: being a resolution of forty three questions concerning prerogative, right and priviledge, in reference to the supream prince and the people. / By Samuel Rutherford professor of divintiy of St Andrews in Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Rutherford, Samuel, 1600?-1661.

titleStmt.title: A treatise of civil policy: being a resolution of forty three questions concerning prerogative, right and priviledge, in reference to the supream prince and the people. / By Samuel Rutherford professor of divintiy of St Andrews in Scotland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Simon Miller at the Star in St Pauls Church-yard near the West end.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 26"; the last number of the imprint date has been marked through and replaced with a "6".
Bound with items from the Thomason Tracts collection with dates in March 1656.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
